info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024
rating_comment: It is a great place to stay. Both manager and supervisor Mr Motior and Mr Kausar were very cooperative and helpful. It is always feels like home. Best things my mother like this place very much.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Group trip
rating_comment:
Our family had a wonderful experience staying in Mr. Mollick's large and spacious apartment. The generous room space provided a comfortable and welcoming atmosphere for everyone. Despite a minor setback of having less winter comforters than anticipated, Mr. Mollick's swift response and accommodation ensured our overall satisfaction.
One of the highlights of our stay was the fully equipped kitchen. It was a game-changer for us as a family, allowing us to prepare meals effortlessly. The abundance of groceries available made cooking and serving a breeze. From breakfast to dinner, we didn't face any issues, and the well-stocked kitchen contributed significantly to the overall convenience of our stay.
Mr. Mollick's attention to our needs and his commitment to ensuring a positive experience were evident throughout our stay. Despite the initial concern with the comforters, his responsiveness and efforts to make things right left a lasting impression on us. Definitely worth retuning!

rating_comment: Great location. Staff was very helpful. Very spacious flat. Definetely plan to use his home again when we travel to Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed with kids

info: Rating, 2 stars,  · January 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Unfortunately, I would not recommend staying here. Mr. Mollick is very friendly and a nice person, but the unit did not at all meet our expectations. The bathrooms and kitchen as well as the light switches were not entirely clean. The laundry machine is not functional so please do not depend on laundry service here. We once went into the kitchen to look for utensils and upon opening the cupboards, there were cockroaches coming out. The unit itself does not have much natural light although it has a lot of room. One of the most challenging parts was that the main bedroom is extremely noisy at nighttime with street noises, to be expected in Dhaka but as we’ve visited the area before, this was a bit excessive. Also, only 1/3 washrooms has hot water which was very inconvenient, plus the hot water runs out quickly and there is no shower curtain. On the plus side, the location was good, the host was communicative, and the staff at the building were kind.

He is an excellent host.
This is a wonderful location and the place is great. I don’t have anything to complain . The apartment is very specious, clean and close to shopping, food , basically everything. info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2021,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: Had an absolutely wonderful time here! Mr. Mollick's home is spacious, and has all amenities that any expat would need. Having lived in USA for 25+ years, I would give it an excellent rating any day. Close to multiple restaurant for take out. ISP speed was stable at 90 Mbps download almost consistently. Book it! It's a gem of a place.
